Entries.Introduction: Oh, hey. So you're the new guy, huh? Cool.^Hey, you're the new girl, huh? I think we're going to get along great. I'm Alexa.#$e#I'll see you around.
Entries.Tue: The beach is a cool place to hang out and soak up some rays.#e#You gotta spend some time in the sun or else you'll get all pale.#$e#Hey, do you wanna hang out with me at the beach some time? Do you wear trunks or briefs?$s^*sigh*... I wish there were more guys in this town, know what I mean?
Entries.Fri: Hey, what's up farmer guy? Did you get new pants? You're doing something right.^Hey, it's farm girl.#e#Oh, I almost forgot! It's my day for doing push-ups!#e#Every time I do push-ups I try to do one more than last time. Pretty cool strategy, huh?
Entries.Sat: My arms are really sore, but that's the sign of progress for a girl like me.#e#I must've done a thousand push-ups yesterday.
Entries.summer_Mon: Hey, farmer guy. You've got a nice tan going.^Hey Farmer girl. You look a little burnt.$h#$e#The more I practice this summer, the easier it'll be for me to go pro.#$e#Then you'd be able to say you knew me once. Cool, huh?
Entries.summer_Tue: If my hair wasn't so popular with the guys, I swear I'd shave it all off in a second.#$e#*sigh*... Life can be tough.
Entries.summer_Wed: Hey farm guy, I've got a question for you.^Hey Farm girl, I've got a question for you.#$b#$q 52/53 summer_Wed_01_old#Do you think I'll ever turn pro?#$r 52 30 summer_Wed_01_01#You're destined to be a sports legend#$r 52 0 summer_Wed_01_02#Maybe, if you practice a lot#$r 53 -50 summer_Wed_01_03#No, you'll most likely fail and become a waitress
Entries.fall_Wed: Hey, I want to ask you something.^Hey, can I ask you something?#$e#$q 54/55 fall_Wed_01_old#What do you think about my haircut?^Do you think the guys like my haircut?#$r 54 30 fall_Wed_01_01#It looks very fashionable.#$r 55 -30 fall_Wed_01_02#It looks like some kind of fungal growth.

Entries.winter_Sat: There's some weird people living in this town.#$e#...like that girl Sabrina. Why does she wear black all the time?#$e#I don't get it.

Entries.Mon8: #$1 Caroline23#When we first moved to Pelican Town I would take secret walks to the Wizardess' tower. She used to show me some very... *ahem* fun spells. Don't tell Pierre, he has jealousy issues.#$e#Abigail was born about a year after we moved to Pelican Town. I wonder if she'll ever experience life outside the valley?

Entries.Introduction: Ah, the new farmer we've all been expecting... and whose arrival has sparked many a conversation!#$b#I'm Elayne... I live in the little cabin by the beach. It's a pleasure to meet you.
Entries.event_boat1: ... I was worried you might not feel this way about me.$l^So am I.$l

Entries.summer_Mon_inlaw_Alex: How's my granddaughter doing? I imagine she's quite happy living on the farm.#$e#She deserves to be happy... she's a good girl.
Entries.fall_Sat: Are you friends with Alexa?#$e#Sometimes she worries me sick.

Entries.Wed: Alexa is my granddaughter. Have I told you that already?#$e#Huh? Speak up.
Entries.Wed_inlaw_Alex: You're part of the family, now. I'm glad that my granddaughter found such a nice husband.^How can two women get married? It's unnatural... Hmmph. I guess I'm just "old fashioned"...
Entries.Wed10_inlaw_Alex: You're part of the family, now... and I couldn't be more proud.^I'll admit, I thought it was... strange... for two women to be together. But you're such a nice young woman, and I know you two are in love... I've changed my mind.
Entries.Wed8: I wish my legs worked so I could play catch with Alexa.$s#$e#That'll never happen.$s

Entries.Event_room1: Her? No!#$b#...Well, I guess I used to like Alexa. But not anymore! She's immature.
Entries.summer_Fri: I wonder what Alexa is doing today...#$e#Huh? I didn't notice you standing there.
Entries.winter_Sun: Will you say hi to Alexa for me?#$e#Thanks.
Entries.winter_Sun6: Um, if you see Alexa could you tell her I'm busy today?#$e#Thanks.

Entries.Introduction: It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm Harley, the local doctor.#$e#I perform regular check-ups and medical procedures for all the residents of Pelican Town. It's rewarding work.#$e#I hope you'll find your own work equally rewarding, in time.$h

Entries.Sun2: Shania's gone a lot, and Aunt Marnie is busy all the time... so I have to invent my own games.#$e#I'm thankful for all my toys.$h
Entries.Sun10: Did you know Shania's my godmother? She was a friend of my parents.$s#$e#...they died.*sniff*$s

Entries.Thu6: Where does all the time go? *sigh*#$e#I remember when Sam was a little baby wearing diapers. She was such a cute little kid.$s#$e#Don't tell her I said that.$h#$e#You must really like talking to me, huh?
Entries.fall_Thu: Maybe I've spoiled the kids a bit. They've never had to do any chores.#$e#I guess I want them to be able to enjoy their childhood while they still can. Well, Sam's basically a woman now, though.#$b#I hope she hasn't grown up to be lazy. That won't do.$s#$e#Being a parent isn't very easy.
Entries.winter_Thu: Sam makes a lot of noise with that music of hers. I hope it doesn't disturb the neighbors.
Entries.winter_Thu_inlaw_Sam: How's Sam doing? I have to admit, there's less cooking and cleaning to do since she moved out...

Entries.Thu6: #$1 Kent1#I've been up since 4 o'clock... sometimes I wonder if I'll ever get back into a normal routine.$k#$e#Sam has really grown up since I left. She's a woman now.#$e#I wish I could've been there for her.$s
Entries.Thu: Are you friends with my daughter?#$e#You probably know her better than I do...$s

Entries.Tue: My niece Shania has been staying at my place the last few months.#$e#She helps me out with the chickens, so I'm not complaining.
Entries.Fri4: #$1 marnieLike#I think someone in town has taken a liking to me. *teehee*$k$h#$e#I would be so lonely if Shania ever moved out.

Entries.Indoor_Night_Sebastian: #$c .5#I may be a reclusive girl, but I'm always happy when you're around.$h#$e#Hi, @. Good to see you. It's comforting when you're around.$h

Entries.winter_Sam: I've given up on being a musician. I want to spend my time focused on our family!

Entries.Bad_9: I wonder if I could've done better... I was very good friends with Sabrina before we met. She was probably the one...$s

Entries.Rainy_Day_3: *giggle*... I just woke up and I'm hungry for some protein.$9
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: I think I might start reading books. I don't want to become stagnant now that I'm a married girl!
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: How's it going? I've been carrying the old gridball around with me all day. A girl can pretend...$u
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: Oh... the smell? I've been eating garlic all day. I'm trying to stay healthy... Sorry.$l
Entries.OneKid_0: I'm still getting used to my new life as a stay-at-home mom.$h
Entries.OneKid_1: Little %kid1 is going to grow up strong, just like me.
Entries.OneKid_3: I wonder what it's like for other women to be pregnant...?$h
Entries.TwoKids_2: Maybe %kid2 will be the first professional gridball player from Pelican Town?$h
Entries.spring_23: Oh... tomorrow's the flower dance, isn't it? I better do some extra crunches tonight.$9#$e#Those dresses are pretty tight... and everyone's going to be watching closely.
Entries.summer_1: Summer's a very energetic time of year, and my body feels it too! I feel solid.

Entries.Rainy_Night_3: What did I do today? I'll just say this... it takes a lot of work to maintain this toned physique!
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: I've been taking much better care of myself now that we're together. The unmarried life wasn't particularly healthy for me.
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: I never had much success growing plants in my old beach house. Hopefully I can pick up a thing or two by watching you.#$e#In this respect, you are the master and I only a humble apprentice.
Entries.OneKid_3: Caring for babies isn't exactly my strong suit... but I'll do my best to be a good mother.
Entries.TwoKids_1: I was carrying %kid1 earlier, and I could've sworn I heard a "Ma...ma".$h
Entries.fall_26: Would you still love me if I guzzled two gallons of pumpkin ale at the Spirit's Eve festival? Sometimes a woman likes to get wild...

Entries.Outdoor_2: I may not be the most exciting girl, but I'll stay loyal to you for the rest of my life.$l
Entries.OneKid_3: So far, I really like being a mother!$h
Entries.TwoKids_3: My life is devoted to you and the children now, and I'm very happy about it. I always dreamed of having a wonderful family.$l#$e#I had nightmares of being alone forever.... I love you so much.$l
Entries.summer_1: Make sure you don't get sunburnt, dear! It's very dangerous for your skin.$8#$e#As your wife and doctor, I consider your health and safety my top priority!

Entries.spring_22: If my sister wasn't such a hermit I'd invite her over for dinner sometime.
Entries.summer_20: I wonder if my sister will ever have the courage to ask Abigail out?

Entries.Rainy_Day_1: I wonder if Maru and Dr. Harley will ever get together? I'm sure Harley likes her...#$e3#I think Maru will have to make the first move, though.$h
Do you think Sabrina and Abigail will ever hook up?#$e#Heh... now that I'm married I'm trying to get everyone else married too.
Entries.spring_12: Are you excited for tomorrow's festival? It'll be cool to see Sabrina again.

Entries.OneKid_1: It's weird, but I really like being a mother!$h
Entries.TwoKids_3: I never thought I'd become the homemaker type, but I'm really satisfied with what we've built here. Life is going great.$l

Entries.Outdoor_3: I don't want to get soft now that I'm a married girl. Maybe I should start eating more hot pepper and working out?#$e#Just an idea...$h
Entries.OneKid_0: I'm still getting used to being a mother. Don't worry, I'll take good care of %kid1! It's just... something new.
Entries.Good_3: I don't often show it, but I'm really happy that I'm your wife. Marrying you was the best decision I ever made.$l
Entries.spring_23: Oh... tomorrow's the flower dance, isn't it? Do we have to go?#$e#I hate wearing that ridiculous dress. Why does Lewis make us do this?$s

Entries.fall_15: The Stardew Valley Fair is a little crowded for my tastes... but I'll just hang out with Sam. It'll be good to catch up with her.#$e#You should play some carnival games, though! Don't worry about me.$7

Entries.Indoor_Day_4: I may keep to myself a lot, and I may seem unhappy sometimes... but I do appreciate all the work you do. I'm a lucky girl.$6
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: Buh... I wish I was ten pounds lighter and a whole lot smarter...#$e#You like me for who I am? I still have a hard time understanding that...
Entries.OneKid_3: Mama Shania reporting for duty...$6#$e#Buh... I've become corny in my old age.
Entries.Good_2: The name 'Shania' means 'Gift from Yoba'... What a joke.
Entries.Good_6: Ah... this is the life. No responsibilities, Tunnelers game tonight, fridge stocked with all the goodies a girl could need.$h

Entries.Wed: On Tuesdays and Thursdays I work at Harley's clinic.#$b#She says she likes having me around in case her medical equipment goes haywire!$h#$e#Being a farmer must be pretty easy, huh?
Entries.Wed8: I work at Harley's clinic on Tuesdays and Thursdays.#$e#She's nice, but not really my type...
Entries.Event_Hospital_1: Of course she'll know the difference! This sample is completely ruined!%fork$s
Entries.Event_Hospital_3: You're right. I should just tell her the truth.%fork$u

Entries.summer_Tue: Sabrina is my half-sister, if you didn't know already.#$e#We look totally different.
Entries.summer_Tue4: Sabrina hardly ever talks to me. I wonder if she even likes me at all?#$e#It's sad, I want to have a sister but she doesn't act like one.

Entries.Fri: You've met my daughter Sabrina, right? She lives downstairs.#$e#She's a little shy, but I'm sure she'll warm up to you if you're nice to her.
Entries.Fri_inlaw_Sebastian: I miss my Sebby... she was always a little misunderstood, but I believed in her.
Entries.Fri4: #$1 RobinSeb#I found an ashtray in Sabrina's room, and it smelled really weird. Should I be worried about this?#$e#Sometimes I worry about Sabrina... she doesn't have many friends and doesn't really seem to care about her future very much...#$e#I would talk to her about it but she never opens up to me.
Entries.Fri4_inlaw_Sebastian: Sabrina told me she's trying to quit smoking! I'm really proud of her.

Entries.Mon8: I'll tell you a secret... my name 'Sam' is short for 'Samantha'.$l#$e#Most people don't know that so keep it on mute.

Entries.Wed6: I've been friends with Sabrina for a while. She's a pretty cool girl.#$e#If you two weren't around I wouldn't really have any friends in town.

Entries.fall_26: Tonight, after everyone is asleep, that weird old woman who lives in the woods will set up the haunted maze. She always makes sure no one is around to see her working.

Entries.dumped_Guys: %Shania has a glazed look in her eye. She won't speak to you.
Entries.JojaMart: %Shania's hard at work. She doesn't seem interested in talking.

Entries.event_room1: Okay... that'll require a great script. Maybe I'll ask Elayne for advice next time I see her at the saloon.$s

Entries.Mon: I wanna be just like my big sister when I grow up!$h#$e#Okay! Bye!

Entries.Sam0: I'm going to be really happy as your wife, @.$l#$e#I'm excited.
